headline: Trump’s Lawyers Say They Didn’t Know Bolton’s Book Was a Problem
abstract: White House aides insisted they properly handled the manuscript by the former national security adviser, but they also created a politically fraught moment for the president.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — When John R. Bolton’s book manuscript landed on the desk of a White House national security aide shortly after Christmas, no one had to page through it to know that the draft could upend the impeachment proceedings against President Trump.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
The Room Where It Happened: A White House Memoir (Book)
